STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Discover the Perfect Teddy Bear for You

LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: New arrivals: Limited edition holiday bears now available!
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Cuddle Up with Your Perfect Furry Friend
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Discover our adorable collection of handcrafted teddy bears, ready to bring warmth and joy to your home.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Our teddy bears are made with the softest materials, perfect for snuggling and comfort.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Classic teddy bear styles that never go out of fashion, beloved by all generations.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Rigorously tested to meet the highest safety standards, suitable for children and adults alike.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Make your teddy bear unique with custom embroidery, outfits, and accessories.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Limited edition bears for collectors, featuring special designs and premium materials.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Our durable construction ensures your teddy bear will be a loyal companion for years to come.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Discover the perfect furry friend for endless hugs and love
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Cuddle Up with Your New Best Friend
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have questions or want to order a custom teddy bear? We're all ears!
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Cuddly Questions: Your Teddy Bear FAQs
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What makes our teddy bears special?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our teddy bears are crafted with premium, ultra-soft materials and filled with love. Each bear undergoes rigorous quality checks to ensure it's perfect for cuddling and built to last for years of companionship.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Are your teddy bears suitable for all ages?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Absolutely! We have a wide range of teddy bears suitable for newborns, children, and adults alike. All our bears meet or exceed safety standards, making them perfect companions for everyone.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I personalize my teddy bear?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, you can! We offer customization options including embroidered names, special outfits, and even recordable voice messages. Make your teddy bear truly one-of-a-kind!
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What is your return policy for teddy bears?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We want you to be completely satisfied with your new furry friend. If for any reason you're not happy, we offer a 30-day return policy. Simply return the bear in its original condition for a full refund or exchange.
CTA_BODY: Discover the perfect teddy bear to brighten your day and warm your nights. Our lovable collection is waiting to become your new best friend.
CTA_SUBTITLE: Bringing Joy, One Bear at a Time
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our adorable teddy bears
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What materials are your teddy bears made from?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our teddy bears are crafted from high-quality, hypoallergenic plush materials that are soft to the touch and safe for all ages.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Are your teddy bears suitable for children?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Absolutely! All our teddy bears meet or exceed safety standards for children's toys and are perfect companions for kids of all ages.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, we offer personalization services including custom embroidery, outfit selection, and even voice message integration for truly unique teddy bears.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with your teddy bear, you can return it for a full refund or exchange.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How do I care for my teddy bear?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: To keep your teddy bear in top condition, we recommend spot cleaning with a damp cloth. For deeper cleaning, most of our bears are machine washable on a gentle cycle.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our teddy bears are crafted with love and designed to be your child's best friend.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Made from the softest materials and built to last, our bears are perfect for hugs and playtime.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: From classic browns to colorful characters, find the perfect teddy bear for every personality.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 Cuddly Companions. All rights reserved. Bringing joy and comfort to homes since 1985.
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Cuddle Up with Our Beary Special Updates!
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Discover why our teddy bears are loved by children and adults alike
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This teddy bear has become my daughter's best friend. She takes it everywhere and can't sleep without it!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The quality and softness of these teddy bears are unmatched. It's the perfect gift for any occasion.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a collector, I'm impressed by the craftsmanship and attention to detail. These bears are truly special.
